sentence.Network_en: American nocturnal goatsucker with gray - and - white plumage.
sentence.Network_cn: 北美洲灰白色羽毛夜间活动的夜鹰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 夜字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 夜莺〖 philomel;nightingale〗 夜鹰〖 Nightjar;goatsucker〗 夜游神〖 onewhoisupandaboutatnight〗.

list.abs: mainly nocturnal North American goatsucker ., 主要在夜间活动的北美夜鹰.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: so named because the bird was thought to suck goats' udders

means.word_mean: 1. mainly crepuscular or nocturnal nonpasserine birds with mottled grayish-brown plumage and large eyes; feed on insects
